# Introduction

## Basic Linear Model

Note the output that you get from a standard regression.

```{r}
lm_model = lm(Reaction ~ Days, data = sleepstudy)
summary(lm_model)
```

Now we will run a mixed model.  Here we will have a *random effects* for an individual.

```{r}
library(lme4)

mixed_model = lmer(Reaction ~ Days + (1 + Days|Subject), data = sleepstudy)

summary(mixed_model)
```
